about_the_game:
🛠️MANAGE YOUR FACTORY🛠️

Buy your resources, storage canisters, conveyors, and specific machines, and start manufacturing deadly goods. Expand your factory, unlock new weapons to craft, and new machines to build, and become a lord of war. You can customize and expand your factory to your desire.

🎨DESIGN YOUR WEAPONS🎨

Not satisfied with the general weapons? Customize your own gun and sell them in your own gun shop. Name it, define it, and use your own images and imagination. Make the weapons look handsome when firing.

🏪MANAGE YOUR SHOP🏪

Build the biggest gun shop ever. Interact with different types of customers, get special orders from around the world, sell rockets, pistols, rifles, and your own customized weapons, get rich, and expand your gun manufacturing kingdom.

✅UPGRADE YOUR MACHINES✅

Upgrade the abilities of your machines, make them faster, and more durable. Unlock, and obtain machine modules with special attributes. Install them to your machines and make them work with unique effects and attributes.

🔫UNLOCK NEW WEAPONS AND MACHINES🔫

As you progress through the game, you can buy licences to manufacture new and deadlier weapons. You can unlock new machines to complete your mass production orders and stock up your high quality gun store.

name: Gun Factory Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Take control of your very own firearms factory. Start with a workshop and a gun shop, and evolve it into a factory of mass destruction. Craft bullets to rockets, handguns to shotguns, design your own weapons, and become a merchant of death. Get use to the smell of gunpowder and cash.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
